title: Poverty rate of black families in the U.S. 1990 to 2018
summary: In general Percentage of poor black families has rose over the Year.
Percentage of poor black families is gradually increasing from 2000 to 2003, roughly decreasing from 2003 to 2005, and finally roughly increasing from 2005 to 2007.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2000 and 2001.
The highest Percentage of poor black families, of value 22.8 was reached at Year 2004
Minimum Percentage of poor black families about 19.3 was reached at Year 2000
min_summary: Overall Percentage of poor black families has increased over the Year.
